meanings.definition: A person who is polled or surveyed.
meanings.sent1: The pollees were asked about their favorite color.
meanings.sent2: The pollees filled out the survey with their opinions.
meanings.sent3: The pollees chuckled as they answered the poll questions.
meanings.sent4: The pollees stood out like bright stars in the survey results.
meanings.sent5: The pollees' responses were as diverse as a garden of flowers.

meanings.definition: The individuals who are the subjects of a poll or survey.
meanings.sent1: All the pollees agreed on the best movie of the year.
meanings.sent2: The pollees' feedback helped improve the survey questions.
meanings.sent3: The pollees shared funny stories while waiting for the poll to end.
meanings.sent4: The pollees' opinions were like puzzle pieces forming a picture.
meanings.sent5: The pollees' voices echoed through the survey room like music.
